choices.C: Invoke the setCurrentPhaseId(RENDER_RESPONSE) method on the FacesContext object.
choices.A: Set the immediate="true" attribute on the command button that was used to perform this call.
choices.B: Invoke the dispatch() method on the ExternalContext object.
choices.D: Invoke the responseComplete() method on the FacesContext object.

discussion.content: according to this page https://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/tutorial/doc/bnaqq.html, on a redirect you should call responseComplete ( answer D )

questions.question_text: When handling a JSF request, your application code decided to redirect the call to another URL by using HTTP redirect. Which action should you take to correctly complete the handling of the JSF life cycle?

choices.C: ensuring that data is not modified in transit
choices.B: verifying that a user is allowed to perform an action
choices.A: protecting data from unauthorized viewing by using encryption

questions.question_text: Which two capabilities are provided by the Java Authentication and Authorization Services (JAAS) API? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: B and C as per some other sites

discussion.content:
Correct answer is C and tested on eclipse :

choices.B: Add @Embeddable annotation at line 1 and replace both @Id annotations with @EmbeddedId annotations.
